Name: Andorra la Vella
Description: Andorra la Vella is the capital of Andorra, known for its picturesque setting in the Pyrenees and as a popular shopping and tourist destination.

Name: Escaldes-Engordany
Description: Escaldes-Engordany is located near Andorra la Vella, famous for its thermal springs and vibrant urban development.

Name: Encamp
Description: Encamp is a town in Andorra known for its ski resorts and being a gateway to the Grandvalira ski area.

Name: Sant Julià de Lòria
Description: Sant Julià de Lòria is known for its green valleys and as a location for various cultural and sporting events.

Name: La Massana
Description: La Massana is a region in Andorra known for its scenic beauty and as a hub for winter sports activities.

Name: Ordino
Description: Ordino is a charming and mountainous town, known for its traditional Andorran architecture and outdoor activities.
